information.name: ucrm-client-signup-plugin
information.description: A UCRM plugin that provides a frontend form for clients to signup, and select payment plans, and submit payment information.
information.author: Charuwts, LLC

configuration.label: Allowed Public Origin
configuration.description: This prevents cross origin requests by restricting it to a specified origin. (Example: https://yourdomain.com)

configuration.label: Form Title
configuration.description: Displayed below logo before form description. [not included in embed]

configuration.label: Logo URL
configuration.description: Displayed above form. [not included in embed]

configuration.label: Form Description
configuration.description: Displayed below logo before the form. (Can contain HTML) [not included in embed]

configuration.label: Completion Text
configuration.description: Text shown upon signup completion. (Text Only) [included in embed]

configuration.label: Collect Payment Info
configuration.description: If turned off, client will not be asked for payment information.

configuration.label: Create Lead
configuration.description: Create Lead instead of Client [included in embed] (This feature is not yet available since quoted services are not available to the api in UCRM.)
